entry.title: Some Day Peg: A crazy two-way peg bridging BTC to other chains Raw
entry.summary: Hi all,Robin has shared an interesting implementation of a two-way peg in Bitcoin Script. The implementation can be found on this GitHub gist: [link].A two-way peg is a mechanism that allows for the transfer of assets between two different blockchains. In this case, Robin has attempted to implement it in Bitcoin Script.Bitcoin Script is a programming language used for creating smart contracts on the Bitcoin blockchain. It provides a set of instructions that dictate how transactions are processed.The GitHub gist provides the code for the implementation of the two-way peg. It includes functions for depositing and withdrawing funds between the Bitcoin blockchain and another blockchain. The code utilizes OP_RETURN and OP_CHECKMULTISIGVERIFY operations to ensure the validity of transactions.While this implementation is not intended for production use, it serves as an interesting exploration of the possibilities of Bitcoin Script. It demonstrates the potential for creating more complex smart contracts and interoperability between different blockchains.Overall, Robin's implementation of a two-way peg in Bitcoin Script provides a glimpse into the potential of the language and its capabilities for creating innovative solutions in the blockchain space.-Robin
